review: Delivered almost a week later than scheduled. Works great.
author: JoJo

review: Works great other than occasionally saying no internet connection and you have to unplug it. Happens about once every few days. Other than that for the price a great purchase!
author: Timothy T. Watson "metalmanw3"

review: For what it is (a little stick), it isn't bad. It runs very slow to load main screens and freezes often. Coming from apple tv to this, I somewhat regret my decision and wonder if the fire tv is any better but don't want to throw any more money away towards it.
author: Cconklin

review: I constantly have to unplug this because it does not respond. I had two check my internet so it's definitely the stick. Don't waste your money.
author: Farren

review: i'm slowly but surely moving toward cutting the cable, and this product is a must for reaching my goal
author: James Jordan

review: It works great. But it doesn't work unless it is plugged into the wall. Which really defeats the purpose of the stick. Better off getting the whole box since it needs to be plugged in anyway.
author: Christine

review: Works fantastically, great addition for the living room
author: Herbert G. Officer
